posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: April 5, 2018 at 1:46 PM#2Your initial concatenation instinct was on the right track, but it's not done with '+' in MA2 command line syntax. Instead, string concatenation is done with Addvar.Setvar $fx_num = 1Setvar $fx_name = "Red Blue "  //Note the space between 'Blue' and the quotesAddvar $fx_name = $fx_num  //This is the concatenation stepCall Effect $"fx_name"  //Make sure you have the variable name in quotes so that the contents are treated as a stringAddvar $fx_num = 1[testing for loopage] loop back to line 2...or something along those lines
